thread.title: Watch the new Ferrari F1 car on track
thread.title_full: Watch the new Ferrari F1 car on track

title: Watch the new Ferrari F1 car on track
text:
Feb 25, 2017 at 4:09p ET 0Shares 
Following the unveiling of the Ferrari SF70H at the Fiorano Circuit in Italy on Friday, both Sebastian Vettel and Kimi Raikkonen got a chance to take their new car out for a spin. 
While the Scuderia Ferrari drivers werenâ€™t able to get their 2017 machine up to full song, they were reportedly quite pleased with what they felt. 
The first time the teams and drivers will get a proper taste of what their machines can do is at the first official preseason test at the Circuit de Catalunya in Barcelona on Monday. 0
